# visiblePath

**Instance Property**

The portion of the view to show in the preview.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying @MainActor var visiblePath: UIBezierPath? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Specify the path information in the coordinate space of the view being animated.

## Configuring the preview attributes

- **backgroundColor**: The background color to display behind the preview.
- **shadowPath**: The path to use for drawing the preview’s shadow.
